miic.core.ndarray_sigproc.ndarray_smooth¶

ndarray_smooth(X, wsize, wtype, axis=1)[source]¶

Moving average filter using a window with requested size.

This method is based on the convolution of a scaled window with the signal. It is applied along the specified axis. Each row/col (i.e. depending on the selected axis) is “prepared” by introducing reflected copies of it (with the window size) in both ends so that transient parts are minimized in the beginning and end part of the resulting array.

Parameters:
  • X (ndarray) – Matrix to be filtered
  • wsize (int) – Window size
  • wtype (string) – Window type. It can be one of: [‘flat’, ‘hanning’, ‘hamming’, ‘bartlett’, ‘blackman’]
  • axis (int) – Axis along with apply the filter. O: row by row 1: col by col
Return type:

ndarray
Returns:

X: Filtered matrix
